subject: Philosophy
title: False Dilemma
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on False Dilemma.

hook.text: You're either with us or against us. Really? There's no middle ground, no third option, no nuance?

buildup.text: A false dilemma presents only two options when more exist. It's a powerful tool of manipulation.

discovery.text: Politicians love it: 'Support this policy or you don't care about children.' Most issues have many positions.

twist.text: Sometimes the dilemma is real. But you should always ask: are there other options being hidden?

climax.text: Spotting false dilemmas opens up creative solutions that binary thinking would have missed.

punchline.text: When someone says 'either/or,' look for the hidden 'and.'

quiz.question: What is a false dilemma?
options: Presenting only two options when more exist
